name: Rare Shrubb
description: The blue back-turf of this creature is specially-adapted to absorb energy in both sunny and low-light environments. Rare Shrubbs devote their bountiful stamina not only to their ceaseless saliva-spraying, but also to the growth of gnarly vine-dreads that drape over their faces and head.
breedingTime: Breeding Time: 10 hr 30 min, Enhanced Time: 7 hr 52 min 30 sec
